doc:
Raymond Huntley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Huntley 0 Horace Raymond Huntley (23 April 1904 – 15 June 1990) was an English actor who appeared in dozens of British films from the 1930s to the 1970s. He also appeared in the ITV period drama Upstairs, Downstairs as the pragmatic family solicitor Sir Geoffrey Dillon. Horace_Raymond_Huntley ( 23_April_1904 – 15_June_1990 ) was an_English_actor who appeared in dozens of British_films from the_1930s to the_1970s . He also appeared in the_ITV_period_drama_Upstairs , Downstairs as the_pragmatic_family_solicitor_Sir_Geoffrey_Dillon .
